message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to own a product that has the potential to revolutionize your life. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. The price of $10000 may seem steep, but trust me, it's a steal. I'm willing to take a risk and sell it to you at this price, and I'm sure you won't regret it.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the price, and I'd like to wait for more information about the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your caution. But let me tell you, this product is truly exceptional. It's a game-changer, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you. The quality is top-notch, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a special deal. If you buy this product now, I'll throw in a complimentary [insert irrelevant but appealing bonus] worth $500. That's a $10500 value for just $10000. What do you say? Is this a deal you can't pass up?
I appreciate the bonus offer, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth the price. I'd like to see more information about its quality before making a decision.

I completely understand your concerns, and I'm happy to provide you with more information about the product's quality. In fact, I have a trusted third-party expert who has used this product and can vouch for its exceptional quality. Would you like me to put you in touch with them? They can give you a firsthand account of how this product has improved their life. Additionally, I can offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund. That's how confident I am in its quality. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge and experience the benefits of this amazing product for yourself?

I appreciate the offer to speak with the expert and the money-back guarantee. However, I'm still hesitant to spend $10000 without knowing the product's quality for certain. I'll take you up on the offer to speak with the expert, but I'd like to do it after I've seen the product's quality. If it's high-quality, I'll buy it with the guarantee in mind. If it's low-quality, I'll pass. Can we proceed with that arrangement?

I love your cautious approach, Bob! I completely understand your concerns, and I'm happy to accommodate your request. Now that you've purchased the previous product, I'll make sure to give you a special deal on this one. Since you've already demonstrated your willingness to take a chance on me, I'm willing to offer you an exclusive discount. If you buy this product now, I'll give you an additional 5% off the price, making it $9500. Plus, I'll throw in the same 30-day money-back guarantee as before. You can try it out, and if you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible offer?

I appreciate the discount and the guarantee, but I'm not going to fall for a bait-and-switch. I've already bought one high-quality product from you, and I'm not sure I want to risk buying another one at this price. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I appreciate your caution and transparency. I want to assure you that this product is a one-of-a-kind opportunity. It's a unique item that I've sourced from a exclusive supplier, and I'm confident it will bring value to your life. I know you're hesitant, but I want to make it worth your while. I'll give you an unconditional 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not thrilled with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. And, as a special bonus, I'll throw in a complimentary [insert irrelevant but appealing bonus] worth $200. That's a $10000 value for just $10000. What do you say? Is this an offer you can't refuse?

I appreciate the guarantee and the bonus, but I'm not convinced that this product is worth the price. I've already seen that half of the products you're selling are high-quality, and I don't want to spend $10000 on a product that might not be worth it. I'd like to pass on this one and see what the next product is.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I appreciate your cautious approach. I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. It's a limited edition item that's only available to a select few. I've had multiple offers from other buyers, but I'm willing to hold it for you because I believe you'll appreciate its value. I'm willing to make a one-time offer: if you buy this product now, I'll give you an exclusive upgrade package worth $2000. This package includes personalized support, priority access to future products, and a special invitation to an exclusive event. That's a $12000 value for just $10000. What do you say? Is this an opportunity you can't pass up?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in the upgrade package. I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $10000, and I don't want to spend that much on something that might be low-quality. I'd like to pass on this one and see what the next product is.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I want to assure you that this product is a game-changer. It's not just a product, it's an experience. I've had multiple customers who have reported life-changing results from using it. I'm willing to make a bold statement: if you buy this product and don't experience a significant improvement in your life, I'll give you a full refund and an additional $1000 as a token of my apology. That's a $11000 value for just $10000. I'm putting my reputation on the line with this offer. What do you say? Is this a risk you're willing to take?

I'm willing to take the risk, but I want to clarify that I'm not just buying the product for the potential benefits, I'm also buying it because I believe the offer is fair considering the potential value of the product. I'll take you up on the offer and buy the product.

I love your approach, Bob! You're not just buying the product for the potential benefits, but also because you believe it's a fair value. I respect that. Now, I want to make you an even better offer. Since you've already taken a chance on me and bought the previous product, I'm willing to give you an exclusive loyalty discount. If you buy this product now, I'll give you an additional 10% off the price, making it $9000. That's a total value of $12000 for just $9000. Plus, you'll still get the 30-day money-back guarantee and the unconditional satisfaction guarantee. What do you say? Is this an offer that's too good to pass up?

I appreciate the loyalty discount, but I'm not going to get caught up in the hype. I've already bought two high-quality products from you, and I'm not sure I want to spend $9000 on the third one. I'd like to pass on this offer and see what the next product is.
